description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nGiran's Strategy:
At the start of battle, this creature's {STAT_health}, {STAT_attack}, {STAT_intelligence}, {STAT_defense} and {STAT_speed} are set equal to those of the second, third, fourth, fifth, and sixth creature in your party.
name: Giran's Skull
